```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
setwd(dir = "../../")
flow_data <- read_csv("data/clean/2023_2024_SABR_tile_flow_n.csv")
```
Plot flow
```{r}
ggplot(flow_data, aes(x = date, y = flow_l)) +
  geom_line(color = "steelblue", linewidth = 1) +
  facet_wrap(~ plot, ncol = 3, scales = "free_y") +
  labs(x = "Date",
       y = "Flow (l)") +
  theme_minimal()

```
